t:
When he was born I promised that I'll kill anyone who'll ever hurt my son.



With the gun pointed at my head, I'm going to keep that promise now.
c:
Think of this as a #continuation of one of my older stories, https://www.yourquote.in/shekhar-dutta-9qp8/quotes/hearing-sounds-downstairs-last-night-i-hunted-down-beat-when-5qjlv


Hearing the sounds downstairs last night, I hunted down and beat the intruder to death.

When the drugs wore off this morning, I recognized my son.





#born #promise #save #protect #broken #revenge #suicide
